channel.description: Recent content in NYS:BRK/A on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway Seeks Up to $1.25 Billion for VeriSign Stake
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. is selling about a third of its stake in VeriSign Inc., locking in a sizable gain since the Warren Buffett-led investment firm began building its stake in the domain name regis
